basic_information.scholarship_name: Family Life Education Faculty & Alumni Scholarship
basic_information.college_name: College of Fine Arts and Design

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who is majoring in Family Life Education. Eligibility Requirements Must be a Family Life Education major Minimum of 3.0 GPA Participates in HES student professional organizations Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
